00014 /**
00015  * helper base-class. helpers are the classes you can access via $this->helpername inside a view
00016  * @package kata
00017  */
00018 class Helper {

00032              /**
00033               * array which holds all relevant information for the current view:
00034               * [isAjax] => false (boolean, tells you if view got called with /ajax/)
00035               * [url] => Array (
00036               *       [url] => locations
00037               *       [foo] => bar (if url read ?foo=bar)
00038               * )
00039               * [form] => Array (
00040               *             (all post-variables, automatically dequoted if needed)
00041               * )
00042               * [controller] => main (name of the controller of this request)
00043               * [action] => index (name of the view of this request)
00044               * @var array
00045               */
00046              public $params;

00069              /**
00070               * constructor, loads tags-templates from config folder
00071               */
00072              function __construct() {
00073                           $defaultTags= array (
00074                                        'link' => '<a href="%s" %s>%s</a>',
00075                                        'selectstart' => '<select name="%s" %s>',
00076                                        'selectmultiplestart' => '<select name="%s[]" %s>',
00077                                        'selectempty' => '<option value="" %s></option>',
00078                                        'selectoption' => '<option value="%s" %s>%s</option>',
00079                                        'selectend' => '</select>',
00080                                        'image' => '<img src="%s" %s/>',
00081                                        'cssfile' => '<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="%s" />',
00082                                        'jsfile' => '<script type="text/javascript" src="%s"></script>'
00083                           );
00084                           $tags = array();
00085                           if (file_exists(ROOT.'config'.DS.'tags.php')) {
00086                                        require (ROOT.'config'.DS.'tags.php');
00087                           }
00088                           $this->tags= array_merge($defaultTags, $tags);
00089              }

00091              /**
00092               * construct an relative url with the base url of the framework
00093               * @param string $url url to expand
00094               * @return string
00095               */
00096              public function urlRel($url= null) {
00097                           if (empty ($url)) {
00098                                        return $this->basePath;
00099                           }
00100                           if ($url {
00101                                        0 }
00102                           == '/') {
00103                                        return $this->basePath.substr($url, 1);
00104                           }
00105                           if ((strlen($url) > 4) && ($url[4] == ':' || $url[5] == ':')) {
00106                                        return $url;
00107                           }
00108 
00109                           if (defined('CDN_URL') && (DEBUG < 1)) {
00110                                        $ext= strtolower(substr($url, -4, 4));
00111                                        if (($ext == '.jpg') || ($ext == '.gif') || ($ext == '.png')) {
00112                                                     return sprintf(CDN_URL, ord($url {
00113                                                                  0 }) % 4).$url;
00114                                        }
00115                           }
00116 
00117                           return $this->basePath.$url;
00118              }
00119 
00120              /**
00121               * shortcut. this is what your are normally using everywhere inside a view
00122               * @param string $url url to expand
00123               * @return string
00124               */
00125              public function url($url= null) {
00126                           return $this->urlAbs($url);
00127              }
00128 
00129              /**
00130               * construct an absolute url (including http(s)) with the base url of the framework. normally needed if you send a view via email and you need the http-part
00131               * @param string $url url to expand
00132               * @return string
00133               */
00134              public function urlAbs($url= null) {
00135                           if (empty ($url)) {
00136                                        return $this->base;
00137                           }
00138                           if ($url {
00139                                        0 }
00140                           == '/') {
00141                                        return $this->base.substr($url, 1);
00142                           }
00143                           if ((strlen($url) > 4) && ($url[4] == ':' || $url[5] == ':')) {
00144                                        return $url;
00145                           }
00146                           return $this->base.$url;
00147              }
00148 
00149              /**
00150               * build an attribute-string of an html-tag out of an array
00151               * @param array $options the name=>value pairs to append to the tag
00152               * @param mixed $exlude null or array of attribute-names not to append (eg. when they are framework-parameters, not html-attributes)
00153               * @param string $insertBefore string to prepand
00154               * @param mixed $insertAfter string to append, or null if you want nothing appended
00155               * @return string attributes as html
00156               */
00157              public function parseAttributes($options, $exclude= null, $insertBefore= ' ', $insertAfter= null) {
00158                           if (is_array($options)) {
00159                                        $default= array (
00160                                                     'escape' => true
00161                                        );
00162                                        $options= am($default, $options);
00163                                        if (!is_array($exclude)) {
00164                                                     $exclude= array ();
00165                                        }
00166                                        $exclude= am($exclude, array (
00167                                                     'escape'
00168                                        ));
00169                                        $keys= array_diff(array_keys($options), $exclude);
00170                                        $values= array_intersect_key(array_values($options), $keys);
00171                                        $escape= $options['escape'];
00172                                        $attributes= array ();
00173                                        foreach ($keys as $index => $key) {
00174                                                     $attributes[]= $this->formatAttribute($key, $values[$index], $escape);
00175                                        }
00176                                        $out= implode(' ', $attributes);
00177                           } else {
00178                                        $out= $options;
00179                           }
00180                           return $out ? $insertBefore.$out.$insertAfter : '';
00181              }
00182 
00183              /**
00184               * turn a single html-attribute into html
00185               * @param string $key attribute-name
00186               * @param string $value attribute-value
00187               * @param boolean $escape if you want the attribute-value to be escaped (htmlentities)
00188               * @return string attribute as html
00189               */
00190              private function formatAttribute($key, $value, $escape= true) {
00191                           $attribute= '';
00192                           $attributeFormat= '%s="%s"';
00193                           $minimizedAttributes= array (
00194                                        'compact',
00195                                        'checked',
00196                                        'declare',
00197                                        'readonly',
00198                                        'disabled',
00199                                        'selected',
00200                                        'defer',
00201                                        'ismap',
00202                                        'nohref',
00203                                        'noshade',
00204                                        'nowrap',
00205                                        'multiple',
00206                                        'noresize'
00207                           );
00208 
00209                           if (in_array($key, $minimizedAttributes)) {
00210                                        if ($value === 1 || $value === true || $value === 'true' || $value == $key) {
00211                                                     $attribute= sprintf($attributeFormat, $key, $key);
00212                                        }
00213                           } else {
00214                                        if (empty ($escape)) {
00215                                                     $bla= h($value);
00216                                        } else {
00217                                                     $bla= $value;
00218                                        }
00219                                        $attribute= sprintf($attributeFormat, $key, $bla);
00220                           }
00221                           return $attribute;
00222              }

00224              /**
00225               * @deprecated 1.1 - 09.11.2008 not needed anymore. use url() instead
00226               * @return string
00227               */
00228              public function urlWebroot($url) {
00229                           return $this->url($url);
00230              }
